titlStmt.titl: COVID-19 Mask days as a per cent of state person days

citation.biblCit: Jacobs, Philip, 2021, "COVID-19 Mask days as a per cent of state person days", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/GJZKVJ, UAL Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:v3FNmuPT8VNUrbl3CdEznw== [fileUNF]

titlStmt.titl: COVID-19 Mask days as a per cent of state person days

stdyInfo.abstract: This database contains total mask days that resulted from local and state legislative mandates. The fields in this database are: State ID, Non-covered mask days, municipal covered days, county covered days, state covered days, non covered days as a ratio of total person days, municipal covered days as a ratio, county covered days as a ratio, state covered days as a ratio, total number of orders in the state.
